a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024); International Telecommunication Union (via World Bank); Gapminder
Note: Landline Internet subscriptions are defined as a fixed access to the public Internet with a download speed of at least 256 kbit/s.
Internet users are people who have accessed the Internet from any location in the last three months.
